Get relevant and empowering training to make the most of your Hitachi Energy systems and equipment products. We provide training for your personnel on Hitachi Energy products, systems, processes, and technology.
The best way to ensure you get maximum use from your Hitachi Energy equipment is to make sure your people get access to our training programs.

Our team can give your team insights into best practices for optimizing the performance of the products and systems you’re using. Hitachi Energy’s Grid Automation experts provide a range of training courses, which typically cover:

From setup to decommissioning products and everything in between, our trainers will help your people enhance the performance and lifespan of your Hitachi Energy assets. Your staff will learn to choose the most effective configuration settings, understand calibration procedures, and perform appropriate monitoring techniques to ensure optimal operations and uptime.
Training also enables your team to ask questions, which expands their understanding and ensures your people know how to operate these assets with your specific system design.

You’ll prepare your people for software and firmware updates with proper training, too. Make sure your team knows what to do when new software releases come along and firmware needs updates to ad-dress bugs, enhance cybersecurity, or improve functionality. Your people need to know how to install and apply updates correctly. They will, with training from Hitachi Energy.
